DOC.brief_title: Relationship Between Sensory Processing Motor Development
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study analyse correlation sensory process motor development preterm infant . A total 60 infant born preterm ( n=30 ) term ( n=30 ) , correct chronological age 10-12 month , include study . Test Sensory Function Infants use evaluate sensory processing , Alberta Infant Motor Scale use evaluate motor development.Spearman correlation test indicate strong positive relation sensory process motor development preterm infant . Given relationship sensory processing motor development preterm group , effective implementation physiotherapy assessment intervention , think necessary evaluate sensory processing well motor development preterm infant .
DOC.criteria: gestational age lower 37 month correct age within 1012 month without congenital anomaly systemic disease stay Neonatal Intensive Care Unit ( NICU ) least 2 week take physiotherapy sensory integration therapy rehabilitation center newborn retinopathy
